sqlMap.select:
SELECT D.PRJ_ID, D.PRJ_NM, SUM(C.ALL_CNT) AS ALL_CNT, SUM(C.END_CNT) AS END_CNT FROM ( SELECT B.*, C.PRJ_NM, C.PRJ_GRP_ID FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID , COUNT(*) AS ALL_CNT , COUNT(DECODE(A.REQ_PRO_TYPE,'04',1)) AS END_CNT FROM REQ4100 A WHERE 1=1
AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE <> '03' AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE <> '05' AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE <> '06'
AND A.PROCESS_ID IS NOT NULL GROUP BY A.PRJ_ID ) B, PRJ1000 C, ( SELECT Z.PRJ_ID , Z.USR_ID FROM ADM1300 Z , ADM1100 X WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_ID = X.PRJ_ID AND Z.AUTH_GRP_ID = X.AUTH_GRP_ID AND Z.USR_ID = #usrId# GROUP BY Z.PRJ_ID, Z.USR_ID ) D WHERE 1=1 AND B.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID AND C.PRJ_ID = D.PRJ_ID(+) AND (C.PRJ_GRP_ID IS NULL OR D.USR_ID IS NOT NULL) ) C, PRJ1000 D WHERE 1=1 AND C.PRJ_GRP_ID = D.PRJ_ID AND D.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# GROUP BY D.PRJ_ID, D.PRJ_NM ,D.ORD ORDER BY D.ORD

SELECT C.*,D.PRJ_NM FROM ( SELECT B.PRJ_GRP_ID AS PRJ_ID, A.REQ_ED_DU_MM, SUM(A.REQ_MM_TOTAL_CNT) AS REQ_MM_TOTAL_CNT, SUM(A.REQ_ED_MM_CNT) AS REQ_ED_MM_CNT, SUM(SUM(A.REQ_MM_TOTAL_CNT)) OVER (PARTITION BY REQ_ED_DU_MM) AS REQ_TOTAL_CNT FROM ( SELECT Y.PRJ_ID , Y.REQ_ED_DU_MM, COUNT(*) AS REQ_MM_TOTAL_CNT , COUNT(DECODE(Y.REQ_ED_RATIO_NUM,1,1)) AS REQ_ED_MM_CNT FROM ( SELECT Z.*, TO_CHAR(Z.REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'YYYY') AS REQ_ED_DU_YY, TO_CHAR(Z.REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'MM') AS REQ_ED_DU_MM, CASE WHEN Z.REQ_PRO_TYPE != '04' THEN -1 WHEN Z.REQ_ED_DU_DTM IS NULL THEN -1 WHEN Z.REQ_ED_DTM IS NULL THEN -1
WHEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(NVL(Z.REQ_ED_DTM,(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0)),'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(Z.REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN 1
ELSE 0 END AS REQ_ED_RATIO_NUM FROM REQ4100 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PROCESS_ID IS NOT NULL AND Z.REQ_PRO_TYPE != '05' AND Z.REQ_PRO_TYPE != '06' ) Y WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY Y.PRJ_ID, Y.REQ_ED_DU_MM ) A, PRJ1000 B, ( SELECT Z.PRJ_ID , Z.USR_ID FROM ADM1300 Z , ADM1100 X WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_ID = X.PRJ_ID AND Z.AUTH_GRP_ID = X.AUTH_GRP_ID AND Z.USR_ID = #usrId# GROUP BY Z.PRJ_ID, Z.USR_ID ) C WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.REQ_ED_DU_MM IS NOT NULL AND B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND B.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID(+) AND (B.PRJ_GRP_ID IS NULL OR C.USR_ID IS NOT NULL) GROUP BY B.PRJ_GRP_ID, A.REQ_ED_DU_MM ) C,PRJ1000 D WHERE 1=1 AND C.PRJ_ID = D.PRJ_ID ORDER BY C.REQ_ED_DU_MM, D.ORD

SELECT C.PRJ_GRP_ID AS PRJ_ID, C.PRJ_NM, B.ALL_CNT, B.END_CNT FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID , COUNT(*) AS ALL_CNT , COUNT(DECODE(A.REQ_PRO_TYPE,'04',1)) AS END_CNT FROM REQ4100 A WHERE 1=1
AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE <> '03' AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE <> '05' AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE <> '06'
AND A.PROCESS_ID IS NOT NULL GROUP BY A.PRJ_ID ) B, PRJ1000 C, ( SELECT Z.PRJ_ID , Z.USR_ID FROM ADM1300 Z , ADM1100 X WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_ID = X.PRJ_ID AND Z.AUTH_GRP_ID = X.AUTH_GRP_ID AND Z.USR_ID = #usrId# GROUP BY Z.PRJ_ID, Z.USR_ID ) D WHERE 1=1 AND B.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID AND C.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND C.PRJ_ID = D.PRJ_ID(+) AND (C.PRJ_GRP_ID IS NULL OR D.USR_ID IS NOT NULL) ORDER BY C.PRJ_GRP_ID, C.ORD

SELECT B.PRJ_GRP_ID, B.PRJ_ID, B.PRJ_NM,A.REQ_ED_DU_MM, A.REQ_MM_TOTAL_CNT, A.REQ_ED_MM_CNT, A.REQ_TOTAL_CNT FROM ( SELECT Y.PRJ_ID , Y.REQ_ED_DU_MM, COUNT(*) AS REQ_MM_TOTAL_CNT , COUNT(DECODE(Y.REQ_ED_RATIO_NUM,1,1)) AS REQ_ED_MM_CNT , SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER (PARTITION BY X.PRJ_GRP_ID, REQ_ED_DU_MM) AS REQ_TOTAL_CNT FROM ( SELECT Z.*, TO_CHAR(Z.REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'YYYY') AS REQ_ED_DU_YY, TO_CHAR(Z.REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'MM') AS REQ_ED_DU_MM, CASE WHEN Z.REQ_PRO_TYPE != '04' THEN -1 WHEN Z.REQ_ED_DU_DTM IS NULL THEN -1 WHEN Z.REQ_ED_DTM IS NULL THEN -1
WHEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(NVL(Z.REQ_ED_DTM,(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0)),'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(Z.REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN 1
ELSE 0 END AS REQ_ED_RATIO_NUM FROM REQ4100 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PROCESS_ID IS NOT NULL AND Z.REQ_PRO_TYPE != '05' AND Z.REQ_PRO_TYPE != '06' ) Y, PRJ1000 X WHERE 1=1 AND Y.PRJ_ID = X.PRJ_ID GROUP BY X.PRJ_GRP_ID, Y.PRJ_ID, Y.REQ_ED_DU_MM ) A, PRJ1000 B, ( SELECT Z.PRJ_ID , Z.USR_ID FROM ADM1300 Z , ADM1100 X WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_ID = X.PRJ_ID AND Z.AUTH_GRP_ID = X.AUTH_GRP_ID AND Z.USR_ID = #usrId# GROUP BY Z.PRJ_ID, Z.USR_ID ) C WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.REQ_ED_DU_MM IS NOT NULL AND B.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID(+) AND (B.PRJ_GRP_ID IS NULL OR C.USR_ID IS NOT NULL) ORDER BY A.REQ_ED_DU_MM, B.ORD

SELECT B.*, C.PRJ_NM FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID , COUNT(*) AS ALL_CNT , COUNT(DECODE(A.REQ_PRO_TYPE,'04',1)) AS END_CNT FROM REQ4100 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID IN ( SELECT Y.PRJ_ID FROM PRJ1000 Y WHERE 1=1 AND Y.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjId# )
AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE <> '03' AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE <> '05' AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE <> '06'
AND A.PROCESS_ID IS NOT NULL GROUP BY A.PRJ_ID ) B, PRJ1000 C WHERE 1=1 AND B.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ADM1300 Z WHERE B.PRJ_ID = Z.PRJ_ID AND Z.USR_ID = #usrId#) > 0 ORDER BY C.ORD

SELECT A.*, B.PRJ_NM FROM ( SELECT Y.PRJ_ID , Y.REQ_ED_DU_MM, COUNT(*) AS REQ_MM_TOTAL_CNT , COUNT(DECODE(Y.REQ_ED_RATIO_NUM,1,1)) AS REQ_ED_MM_CNT , SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER (PARTITION BY REQ_ED_DU_MM) AS REQ_TOTAL_CNT FROM ( SELECT Z.*, TO_CHAR(Z.REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'YYYY') AS REQ_ED_DU_YY, TO_CHAR(Z.REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'MM') AS REQ_ED_DU_MM, CASE WHEN Z.REQ_PRO_TYPE != '04' THEN -1 WHEN Z.REQ_ED_DU_DTM IS NULL THEN -1 WHEN Z.REQ_ED_DTM IS NULL THEN -1
WHEN Z.REQ_ED_DTM <= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(Z.REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN 1
ELSE 0 END AS REQ_ED_RATIO_NUM FROM REQ4100 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_ID IN ( SELECT Y.PRJ_ID FROM PRJ1000 Y WHERE 1=1 AND Y.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjId# ) AND Z.PROCESS_ID IS NOT NULL AND Z.REQ_PRO_TYPE != '05' AND Z.REQ_PRO_TYPE != '06' ) Y WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY Y.PRJ_ID, Y.REQ_ED_DU_MM ) A, PRJ1000 B WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.REQ_ED_DU_MM IS NOT NULL AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ADM1300 Z WHERE B.PRJ_ID = Z.PRJ_ID AND Z.USR_ID = #usrId#) > 0 ORDER BY A.REQ_ED_DU_MM, B.ORD

SELECT D.*,E.PRJ_NM FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID , NVL(A.PROCESS_ID,'request') AS PROCESS_ID , NVL(C.PROCESS_NM,'접수 대기') AS PROCESS_NM , COUNT(*) AS ALL_CNT , COUNT(DECODE(A.REQ_PRO_TYPE,'04',1)) AS END_CNT , C.PROCESS_ORD FROM REQ4100 A, FLW1100 B, FLW1000 C WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID IN ( SELECT Y.PRJ_ID FROM PRJ1000 Y WHERE 1=1 AND Y.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjId# ) AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID(+) AND A.PROCESS_ID = B.PROCESS_ID(+) AND A.FLOW_ID = B.FLOW_ID(+) AND B.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID(+) AND B.PROCESS_ID = C.PROCESS_ID(+)
AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE <> '03' AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE <> '05' AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE <> '06'
GROUP BY A.PRJ_ID, A.PROCESS_ID, C.PROCESS_NM, C.PROCESS_ORD ) D, PRJ1000 E WHERE 1=1 AND D.PRJ_ID = E.PRJ_ID AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ADM1300 Z WHERE D.PRJ_ID = Z.PRJ_ID AND Z.USR_ID = #usrId#) > 0 ORDER BY E.ORD, NVL(D.PROCESS_ORD, -1),D.PROCESS_ID NULLS FIRST

SELECT C.*, D.PRJ_NM FROM ( SELECT A.*, B.PROCESS_NM, B.PROCESS_ORD FROM ( SELECT Y.PRJ_ID , Y.PROCESS_ID , Y.REQ_ED_DU_MM, COUNT(*) AS REQ_MM_TOTAL_CNT , COUNT(DECODE(Y.REQ_ED_RATIO_NUM,1,1)) AS REQ_ED_MM_CNT , SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER (PARTITION BY PRJ_ID, REQ_ED_DU_MM) AS REQ_TOTAL_CNT FROM ( SELECT Z.*, TO_CHAR(Z.REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'YYYY') AS REQ_ED_DU_YY, TO_CHAR(Z.REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'MM') AS REQ_ED_DU_MM, CASE WHEN Z.REQ_PRO_TYPE != '04' THEN -1 WHEN Z.REQ_ED_DU_DTM IS NULL THEN -1 WHEN Z.REQ_ED_DTM IS NULL THEN -1
WHEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(NVL(Z.REQ_ED_DTM,(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0)),'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(Z.REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN 1
ELSE 0 END AS REQ_ED_RATIO_NUM FROM REQ4100 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_ID IN ( SELECT Y.PRJ_ID FROM PRJ1000 Y WHERE 1=1 AND Y.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjId# ) ) Y WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY Y.PRJ_ID, Y.PROCESS_ID, Y.REQ_ED_DU_MM ) A, FLW1000 B WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID(+) AND A.PROCESS_ID = B.PROCESS_ID(+) AND A.PROCESS_ID IS NOT NULL AND A.REQ_ED_DU_MM IS NOT NULL AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE != '05' AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE != '06' ) C, PRJ1000 D WHERE 1=1 AND C.PRJ_ID = D.PRJ_ID AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ADM1300 Z WHERE C.PRJ_ID = Z.PRJ_ID AND Z.USR_ID = #usrId#) > 0 ORDER BY C.REQ_ED_DU_MM, D.ORD, C.PROCESS_ORD

SELECT B.PRJ_ID, B.OVER_TYPE, COUNT(*) AS OVER_CNT FROM ( SELECT CASE A.REQ_PRO_TYPE WHEN '04' THEN CASE WHEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') < TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(NVL(A.REQ_ED_DTM,(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0)),'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN '04' ELSE '05' END ELSE CASE WHEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') < TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(NVL(A.REQ_ED_DTM,(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0)),'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN '03' WHEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM-3,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') < TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(NVL(A.REQ_ED_DTM,(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0)),'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN '02' ELSE '01' END END AS OVER_TYPE ,A.PRJ_ID FROM REQ4100 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE != '01' AND A.PROCESS_ID IS NOT NULL AND A.PRJ_ID IN ( SELECT Y.PRJ_ID FROM PRJ1000 Y WHERE 1=1 AND Y.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjId# ) ) B GROUP BY B.PRJ_ID, B.OVER_TYPE ORDER BY B.PRJ_ID, B.OVER_TYPE

SELECT D.PRJ_GRP_ID AS PRJ_ID, C.OVER_TYPE, SUM(C.OVER_CNT) AS OVER_CNT FROM ( SELECT B.PRJ_ID, B.OVER_TYPE, COUNT(*) AS OVER_CNT FROM ( SELECT CASE A.REQ_PRO_TYPE WHEN '04' THEN CASE WHEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') < TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(NVL(A.REQ_ED_DTM,(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0)),'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN '04' ELSE '05' END ELSE CASE WHEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') < TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(NVL(A.REQ_ED_DTM,(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0)),'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN '03' WHEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM-3,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') < TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(NVL(A.REQ_ED_DTM,(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0)),'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN '02' ELSE '01' END END AS OVER_TYPE ,A.PRJ_ID FROM REQ4100 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE != '01' AND A.PROCESS_ID IS NOT NULL ) B GROUP BY B.PRJ_ID, B.OVER_TYPE ) C,PRJ1000 D, ( SELECT Z.PRJ_ID , Z.USR_ID FROM ADM1300 Z , ADM1100 X WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_ID = X.PRJ_ID AND Z.AUTH_GRP_ID = X.AUTH_GRP_ID AND Z.USR_ID = #usrId# GROUP BY Z.PRJ_ID, Z.USR_ID ) E WHERE 1=1 AND C.PRJ_ID = D.PRJ_ID AND D.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND D.PRJ_ID = E.PRJ_ID(+) AND (D.PRJ_GRP_ID IS NULL OR E.USR_ID IS NOT NULL) GROUP BY D.PRJ_GRP_ID, C.OVER_TYPE ORDER BY D.PRJ_GRP_ID, C.OVER_TYPE
sqlMap.sql:
SELECT ROWNUM RN, T2.LIC_GRP_ID, SF_PRJ1000_GRP_NM(PRJ_GRP_ID) AS PRJ_GRP_NM, T2.PRJ_NM, T1.* FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID , A.REQ_ID , A.REQ_ORD , A.REQ_CLS_ID , NVL(SF_REQ4000_REQ_CLS_NM(A.PRJ_ID, A.REQ_CLS_ID, '2'), '') AS REQ_CLS_NM , A.REQ_NO , A.REQ_USR_ID , NVL(A.REQ_USR_NM, SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_USR_ID, '1')) AS REQ_USR_NM , TO_CHAR(A.REQ_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REQ_DTM , A.REQ_USR_DEPT_NM , A.REQ_USR_EMAIL , A.REQ_USR_NUM , A.REQ_NM , REGEXP_REPLACE (A.REQ_DESC ,'
|
|
' , ' ' ) AS REQ_DESC , A.REQ_CHARGER_ID , A.REQ_COMPLETE_RATIO , A.REQ_FP , A.REQ_EX_FP , D.USR_NM AS REQ_CHARGER_NM , NVL2(A.REQ_ST_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ST_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , '') REQ_ST_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ED_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , '') REQ_ED_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ST_DU_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ST_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') REQ_ST_DU_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') REQ_ED_DU_DTM , A.REQ_PRO_TYPE , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00008', A.REQ_PRO_TYPE, '1') AS REQ_PRO_TYPE_NM , A.REQ_NEW_TYPE , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00009', A.REQ_NEW_TYPE, '1') AS REQ_NEW_TYPE_NM , A.REQ_ACCEPT_TXT , A.SCL_CD , A.REQ_TYPE_CD , A.PIA_CD , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00011', A.SCL_CD, '1') AS SCL_NM , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00012', A.REQ_TYPE_CD, '1') AS REQ_TYPE_NM , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', A.PIA_CD, '1') AS PIA_NM , A.LAB_INP , A.ATCH_FILE_ID , A.CB_ATCH_FILE_ID , A.MILESTONE_ID , A.PROCESS_ID , B.PROCESS_NM , A.FLOW_ID , C.FLOW_NM , C.FLOW_NEXT_ID , A.USE_CD , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DTM , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DTM_DAY , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , TO_CHAR(A.MODIFY_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP , A.ORG_REQ_ID FROM REQ4100 A , FLW1000 B , FLW1100 C , ADM2000 D WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID(+) AND A.PROCESS_ID = B.PROCESS_ID(+) AND A.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID(+) AND A.PROCESS_ID = C.PROCESS_ID(+) AND A.FLOW_ID = C.FLOW_ID(+) AND A.REQ_CHARGER_ID = D.USR_ID(+) AND A.PRJ_ID IN ( SELECT Y.PRJ_ID FROM PRJ1000 Y WHERE 1=1 AND Y.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjId#) AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE = #reqProType# AND TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM ,'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR((A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM) ,'YYYY') || #projectMonth# AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 23:59','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') >= A.REQ_ED_DTM AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE = '04' AND TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM ,'YYYYMM') BETWEEN TO_CHAR((A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM) ,'YYYY') || #projectStartMonth# AND TO_CHAR((A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM) ,'YYYY') || #projectEndMonth# AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 23:59','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') >= A.REQ_ED_DTM AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE = '04' AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE <> '03' AND A.PROCESS_ID IS NOT NULL AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE != '04' AND ( A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM IS NULL OR TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 23:59','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') >= NVL(A.REQ_ED_DTM,(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0)) ) AND ( A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM IS NULL OR TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM-3,'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 23:59','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') >= NVL(A.REQ_ED_DTM,(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0)) ) AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE != '04' AND A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM IS NOT NULL AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 23:59','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') >= NVL(A.REQ_ED_DTM,(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0)) AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM-3,'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 23:59','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') < NVL(A.REQ_ED_DTM,(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0)) AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE != '04' AND A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM IS NOT NULL AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 23:59','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') < NVL(A.REQ_ED_DTM,(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0)) AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE = '04' AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 23:59','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') < NVL(A.REQ_ED_DTM,(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0)) AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE = '04' AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 23:59','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') >= NVL(A.REQ_ED_DTM,(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0)) AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE != '01' AND A.PROCESS_ID IS NOT NULL ) T1, PRJ1000 T2, ( SELECT Z.PRJ_ID , Z.USR_ID FROM ADM1300 Z , ADM1100 X WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_ID = X.PRJ_ID AND Z.AUTH_GRP_ID = X.AUTH_GRP_ID AND Z.USR_ID = #usrId# GROUP BY Z.PRJ_ID, Z.USR_ID ) T3 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.PRJ_ID = T2.PRJ_ID AND T2.PRJ_ID = T3.PRJ_ID(+) AND (T2.PRJ_GRP_ID IS NULL OR T3.USR_ID IS NOT NULL) AND T2.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND T2.PRJ_NM = (SELECT PRJ_NM FROM PRJ1000 WHERE 1=1 AND PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# AND PRJ_NM = #prjNm#) ORDER BY PRJ_GRP_NM, T2.PRJ_NM, TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(T1.REQ_ORD, '[^0-9]')) DESC NULLS LAST
sqlMap.select:
SELECT T4.* FROM (
) T4 WHERE T4.RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#
